SuperStructureProducts.description:
As Dizayn Group, we offer durable and long-lasting solutions with superior quality pipe systems developed with our 37 years of experience and R&D studies. 
With their energy efficiency, environmentally friendly and hygienic features, our products are ideal for reliable and sustainable projects.
SuperStructureProducts.description2: Take your projects a step further with Dizayn Group's superior solutions in indoor pipe systems. It offers energy efficiency, hygiene, and long-lasting use.

elitePipe.title: Elite Pipe
elitePipe.description:
ElitePipe is a safe and long-lasting pipe system with high temperature and pressure resistance. 
By combining the advantages of PPR, PEX and PERT pipes, it provides superior performance and durability.

highlights.highPressure: High Compressive Strength at High Temp.

sterilePipe.title: Sterile Pipe
sterilePipe.description: Sterile Pipe is an innovative pipe system that sterilizes up to 99.9% of the water passing through it by destroying bacteria, mold, fungi and other microbial creatures.

softPowerPipe.title: SoftPower Pipe
softPowerPipe.description: SoftPower Pipe is a durable and long-lasting pipe system made of PE63 raw material, offering high oxidation resistance, flexibility and easy installation.

elasticaPipe.title: Elastica Pipe
elasticaPipe.description:
Elastica Pipe is an innovative pipe system that stands out with its resistance to high temperature and pressure, flexible structure and ease of installation. 
It can be used safely in both underfloor heating systems and radiator installations.

nanotechPipe.title: NanoTech Waste Water Pipe
nanotechPipe.description:
NanoTech Waste Water Pipe is a sound-insulating, highly durable and long-lasting pipe system. 
It is an ideal solution for indoor and outdoor wastewater discharge.

triplexPipe.title: Triplex Waste Water Pipes
triplexPipe.description: Triplex Waste Water Pipes are a high-durability and long-lasting pipe system laid for the discharge of used water inside and outside the building.

pprPipe.title: PPR Pipe
pprPipe.description: PPR Pipe and fittings are produced from Polypropylene Random Copolymer raw material, which has low melt flow index, high molecular weight and high flexibility.

telecomPipe.title: Telecom Pipes
telecomPipe.description:
Cable Casing Pipes are used in rapidly developing communication and data transmission piping systems. 
It is offered with different options, from single to triple, in accordance with the demand and specification. 
It offers a whole system with additional parts that are eye multipliers and complementary elements.

korigePipe.title: Corrugated Pipe
korigePipe.description: Corrugated Pipes offer high durability and long life in sewer systems.

korigeSpiralPipe.title: Dizayn Helical Pipe
korigeSpiralPipe.description:
Helical pipes have a double-layer structure consisting of inner and outer layers. 
The inner layer is a flat surface pipe that carries the fluid. 
The outer layer has a ribbed structure. 
It is produced from Polyethylene and Polypropylene raw materials.

pe80Pipe.title: Dizayn PE 80 Natural Gas Pipe
pe80Pipe.description:
Dizayn PE 80 Natural Gas Pipes and Fittings offer reliable and durable solutions in natural gas lines. 
These pipes, which are light, flexible and impact resistant thanks to the use of polyethylene material, can be used safely in natural gas lines.

jeotermalPipe.title: Dizayn Geothermal Pipe
jeotermalPipe.description: Dizayn Geothermal Pipes are composite pipes that prevent the heat transfer of hot and cold fluids.

denizDesarjPipe.title: Dizayn Marine Discharge Pipes
denizDesarjPipe.description: Dizayn Marine Discharge Pipes are designed for the safe and efficient discharge of wastewater in seas, lakes and rivers.

chemicalTank.title: Design Chemical Tanks
chemicalTank.description: Dizayn Chemical Tanks are designed for the safe and efficient storage of corrosive chemicals.

softPowerPipe.title: SoftPower Pipe
softPowerPipe.description: SoftPower Pipe is a durable and long-lasting pipe system made of PE63 raw material, offering high oxidation resistance, flexibility and easy installation.

rtpPipe.title: RTP Pipe
rtpPipe.description:
RTP (Reinforced Thermoplastic Pipe) Pipes are suitable for all kinds of water, gas, oil, etc. with high pressure resistance. 
is used for transportation. 
While it resists high pressures like steel pipes with its strong composite structure, it offers all the advantages of plastic pipes to its users with its thermoplastic raw material.

kurumsal.title: Corporate
kurumsal.content:
MESSAGE FROM OUR CHAIRMAN OF THE BOARD

Mir Holding was established in 1987 to make breakthroughs in the fields in which it operates today. The first output of the activities carried out for R&D (research and development) in the field of expertise of its founder was "pipe field" and from here Dizayn Group was born. Our first industrial company, Dizayn Group today, produces pipes from 20 mm to 8 m in diameter and from 0.5 Bar pressure to 200 Bar pressure in order to meet different needs from all sectors.

Mir Holding includes 17 companies that "operate in the fields of pipe, agriculture, energy, construction, defense industry and continue R&D studies in a wide range of fields."

The Turkey factory has been serving in Çorlu for many years and is expanding and growing. Later, Ms. Angela Merkel was also present at the opening ceremony of the facility, which was established in Germany, the heart of engineering, to carry its know-how to Europe and other nearby geographies, and expressed her satisfaction for the value our institution will add to her country.

Also Mir Holding is a partner and Board Member of Istanbul University Technopark.

Mir Holding;

- It employs more than 50 R&D engineers with doctoral degrees, 25 professors, and a total of 150 researchers in the field of R&D alone. It is the leader in Turkey in terms of the number of patents converted into production.

- It has the largest private research laboratory in Turkey.

- It has successfully completed the largest budget project of the defense industry in our country. It is the third company in the world to have this technology, after America and Canada.

(Production of a material ten times stronger and five times lighter than steel with a budget of 10.2 million USD)

- It has successfully completed the project with the largest budget in the European Union and transformed it into an industry.

(Smart and green city project with a budget of 49 million Euros)

- The SERAKENT project investment, which started with 2 billion USD and was completed in Eskişehir, was completed quickly.

We achieved this success together with all our stakeholders. I express my deep gratitude to them.

İbrahim Mirmahmutoğulları

Mir Holding Chairman of the Board of Directors

tarihce.title: History
tarihce.content:
1987 to Present

Founded in 1987 to carry out research and development activities, Dizayn Group took the first steps for its current structuring by producing its first R&D output 'PPR pipes and fittings with specially designed molecular structure' in 1991. As our company has been identified with the production and sale of pipes and pipe components over time, the Dizayn brand has been positioned as a pipe brand. As a result of Dizayn's identification with pipes and the importance we attach to specialization, our R&D company was given an independent structure under the name Mir R&D. Dizayn Group, Mir R&D company and our other subsidiaries were gathered under the roof of Mir Holding as of 2010.

Since its establishment, Dizayn Group, which has been producing firsts in Turkey, breaking world records, being the technology pioneer of its sector with dozens of patents that it has turned into industry, has become a world brand by exporting to more than 100 countries with its experience and high production power. With the investments it has realized in various parts of the world, it has set milestones to become a local brand of the important markets to which it takes its know-how, quality and principles.

Design Group, which aims for continuous development for the development of its country, the welfare of its stakeholders and to help those in need all over the world, expresses its gratitude to all its friends with whom it has walked a short or long road and continues to take steps to benefit humanity and the environment in order to “design” the coming years together.

vizyon-ve-misyon.title: Vision and Mission
vizyon-ve-misyon.content:
Our Vision

To become a permanent global brand by producing new technologies that will create added value in the transportation of fluids.

Our Mission

In order to transport fluids with the most optimal method; To achieve being a company that develops reliable and efficient solutions to the right technology, problem-specific projects, product and system development stages.

Our New Product Development Strategies

  • Instead of products that can only be produced by meeting minimum conditions, research- To produce products with advanced output and know-how.
  • Producing products that are competitive in both quality and price.
  • Contemplating the problems that the sector does not make an effort to solve or uses primitive methods.
  • As much as possible, it is the product, not the market. To progress with focus.
  • To be persistent in the issues we work on and to address the problems.
  • Never to imitate the product of a national or international competitor.

taahhutname.content:
OUR VALUE CYCLE

Institutions should have ideals just like individuals. However, it is inevitable that a system built on ideals that only have a counterpart in the bank will get out of control. Many processes have been disrupted by the understanding of winning at all costs, and unfortunately this has become one of the biggest problems of the period we live in.

Institutions should have ideals, just like individuals. However, it is inevitable that a system built on ideals that only have a counterpart in the bank will get out of control. Many processes have been disrupted by the understanding of winning at all costs, and unfortunately this has become one of the biggest problems of the time we live in.

While producing; being environmentally conscious, taking responsibility for one's own waste, Our main values ​​are to ensure the motivation of the people we employ, to be excited about making profit for our country while exporting, and most importantly, to rest our heads comfortably with the feeling that the product we produce will be a solution to the basic needs of humanity.

Finally, we spend a reasonable portion of our earnings in our country or abroad, which will not hinder our own growth. Using it as a cure for a problem of people living anywhere in the world or of the nature that gives life to those people, crowns the dedication shown while producing.

Private or legal entities that base their lives on this philosophy are not the ones creating problems in the world, but the ones solving the problems. They take their place. The happiest family, the best citizen, the most successful manager and the individuals who enlighten those around them with their presence will only emerge from people who have digested this approach.

İbrahim MİRMAHMUTOĞULLARI Chairman of the Board
taahhutname.title: Letter Of Commitment

oduller-ve-basarilar.title: Awards and Achievements
oduller-ve-basarilar.content:
Awards & Achievements

With over 100 patents, it is one of the two companies that produce the most technology in Turkey and has been awarded by the Turkish Patent Institute.

As a result of technology research and development activities, Dizayn Group achieved the impossible by producing a 1600 mm diameter pipe at PN 12.5 pressure in 2001, breaking its own record three times in a row and setting a world record. This record is the first world record that Turkey has broken with an industrial product. Today, not even the first stage of this record has been reached in the entire world.

Developing special projects for the special products it produces, Dizayn Group has implemented many national and international giant projects with technological solutions whose patents belong to it. The Nile River Crossing Project, which brought water to the thirsty Sudanese people, is one of the best examples of this. The project was also met with great admiration by UNESCO and Dizayn Group won the grand prize at the Water Symposium held in France in 2003.

Dizayn Group has earned the right to participate in the World Final by winning both the Universal Contribution and First Place Awards in the Turkey Final of the World Young Entrepreneur Businessman Competition with the projects, products, patents it has, quality certificates and all its other works it has developed since its establishment. Dizayn Group Chairman of the Board of Directors İbrahim Mirmahmutoğulları successfully represented our country in the World Final held in the Philippines with the participation of 12 countries such as Germany, England and the Netherlands, and won the World Young Entrepreneur Businessman Competition Grand Prize. Dizayn Group, which was deemed worthy of an ‘AA’ grade by JCR Eurasia Rating, has taken the first step towards becoming a company that is ‘highly investable at an international level’. In the Innovation Awards competition organized by ISO in 2009, Dizayn Group was deemed worthy of the Grand Prize by receiving the highest score in each category. The 'Company of the Year' award was given to Dizayn Group in the 2009 TAÇED Traditional Service Awards Competition.
